channel.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag PC Moved To November
channel.description:
Availability for the PC version of Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag has been moved from October 31st to November 19th, and a new trailer.
[url='https://www.bluesnews.com/s/145522/pc-assassin_s-creed-iv-black-flag-in-november']https://www.bluesnews.com/s/145522/pc-assassin_s-creed-iv-black-flag-in-november[/url]

item.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag PC Moved To November
item.dc:creator: Serza
item.description:
So, guys.

I pre-ordered on Steam…

Now my DLC tab in Steam Library’s game properties states that I own “Assassin’s Creed IV Black Flag Standart Edition Activation Key” AND “Assassin’s Creed IV - Freedom Cry (SP)” - yet when I look on my CD Key tab, I only see the base game key. On Uplay, Freedom Cry is likewise displayed as not owned.

Is the bug about Freedom Cry displaying in my DLC tab, or about me not being able to play it?

Read full topic
item.source: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag PC Moved To November

item.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag PC Moved To November
item.dc:creator: Diabolical
item.description:
sersoft:

Well I’m getting a Radeon 7870 so if I want to see PhysX effects I’m just gonna have to install the Nvidia drivers to let my CPU emulate them.

Well you supposed have a Nvidia GPU in order to run this PhysX feature if you going to install the Nvidia drivers.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag PC Moved To November
item.dc:creator: Evod
item.description:
Serza:

So, is that achievement hidden, or does it not exist, considering I’m not seeing it in the achievement list?

Also, if there was one, it could be seen as “inviting” to obtain it illegally - and you’d have one helluva problem if you wanted to pursue somebody for it.

Considering I haven’t seen it any other place other than these forums. I don’t think it exists.

Read full topic

item.description:
I did manage a way around the lack of a jog key by simply tapping the sprint/free run key repeatedly. But yeah, Ubisoft’s been rather poor with porting to PC. Supposedly Watch_Dogs was developed with PC as lead platform, so hopefully that will change.

item.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag PC Moved To November
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Unless you use an Xbox 360 controller, specifically. I have a PS2 controller adapter hookup that I use for Sonic Generations, Tomb Raider, and the like, but most games don’t support generic Twin USB functionality and require a wired 360 controller, which I don’t have.
